title: "What does it mean to be a Republican?" With Tim Alberta, Sarah Flores & Denver Riggleman
description: Chuck talks with Politico Magazine's chief political correspondent, Tim Alberta, and staff writer at the Dispatch, Sarah Flores. Plus, a conversation with Congressman Denver Riggleman about the ways his party has changed.
author: nbcnews.podcasts@gmail.com (NBC News)
